content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was negotiating the rental price for an apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number.
name: Yi-Nuo

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as 1.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, at certain points of the negotiation, I felt discriminated or offended.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I felt discriminated or offended because the landlord, Peter Schmidt, was unwilling to consider fair market rates and seemed to be solely motivated by greed. His attitude towards the negotiation was aggressive and dismissive, which made me feel uncomfortable and undervalued as a potential tenant.
name: Yi-Nuo
